title: Zappos website
content:
I happen to love this open letter to the Zappos CEO regrading the company website.

Might be old to some, but I just found it.

[You're Killing Me Zappos by Andrew Wilkinson](http://web.archive.org/web/20130704054126/http:/metalabdesign.com/zappos/)
author: dragoncaller

comments.content: Thanks for posting. This is great. He forgot to mention that the logo is horrible.
Indeed. It's a shame because Zappo's comes across as a great company, I just wish their designs communicated that.
